: : SharpClaw : :
Now released from Battera, SharpClaw was freefalling. He knew this would damage him badly, but it had been worth it to have such a nice shot on that Maximal femme.
SharpClaw changes to beast mode, before slamming into the ground. He layed motionless.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::

She felt the blast go from her belly up and out her shoulder. The 
pain was blinding. She lost her sence of where or what was happening. 
She followed her program and tried to fly higher. They had already 
managed to reach 700 feet in a short time. Her huge wings flapped 
hard as she flew almost straight up with her burden of the other 
bot.  She climbed to almost 1000 feet when she could no longer 
struggle with her load or against the pain and let him fall.

Her body seemed slightly releived to no longer half to fly with that 
much weight. But the blast had done damage. Her wings started to 
tighten up and she too, started to fall. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw allowed himself to be captured in Battera's claw. While 
in her grasp, he presses the barrel of his rifle right against her 
bat mode body.
> SharpClaw: You know the closer your enemy is too you the bigger 
advantage they have.
> SharpClaw opens fire, releasing a plasma blast that will strike 
Battera instently, as it leaves the barrel.
